column6: Spider-Man and his amazing friends are there for the birth of a brand new hero!! Who is he? What is his name?  Here's a hint: It's a name that will make you burst out in applause!!  He's set to be major player in the Ultimate Universe, so be there as hotshot creators BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS (ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN) and TAKESHI MIYAZAWA (RUNAWAYS) bring you his big debut! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:David Lafuente | penciller:Takeshi Miyazawa
